overview:
Exceptional capacity to multitask, manage competing priorities with ease, ability to establish rapid rapport with patients, families, staff, and physicians.

    Perform blood draws, lab work, spirometry, visual acuity testing, physical assessments, urinalysis, psychological evaluations and routine audiologic surveillance. 

    Provide initial assessment, referral as directed, or treatment of injuries and illnesses. 

    Provide initial assessment, referral as directed, or    treatment of injuries and illnesses.   

  Ensure best outcome with earliest possible return to work. 

  Coordinator for regional blood drives.

  Perform behavioral health assessments.
